T11n1242u_001:1: sarva eva hi viśiṣṭo janaḥ śāstrārambhe sveṣṭadevatāstutiṃ kṛtavān |
T11n1242u_001:3: sadācārānuvṛttimātmanaḥ khyāpayansveṣṭadevatāstuteśca puṇyopacayaṃ tataśca śāstrasyāvipte parisamāptiṃ vyākhyāyāḥ śrotṛṇaṃ stutipuraḥsarayā pravṛttyā puṇyātiśayotpādanātpārārthyaṃ cālocya buddhasya bhagavataḥ stutimārabdhavān jayantītyādi |
T11n1242u_001:4: anena ślokena buddhasya bhagavata eva pūjā stotrataḥ |
T11n1242u_001:7: pūrvaṃ svārthasaṃpadaṃ bhagavato darśayati jayanti jātivyasanetyādinā sugataparyattena manastamastānavetyādinā parārthasaṃpadam |
T11n1242u_001:8: jayanti jayaṃ kurvanti vāca iti saṃbandhaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:19: rāgaśaktirādau sa ādiryeṣāṃ dveṣādīnāṃ te rāgādayo bhavatti kleśāḥ |
T11n1242u_001:21: yato bhagavatā sarvakleśā niḥśeṣaṃ nirdagdhā yata eva rāgādyarātirbhagavānata eva jagatastraidhātukajīvalokasya vijetā |
T11n1242u_001:37: tasyā hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ jagattasya jagato vijeturiti |
T11n1242u_001:39: yasmācchobhanādinā gato bhagavānata eva rāgādyāratiḥ yata eva nirdagdhakleśo'
T11n1242u_001:44: tama iti kṛtvā na gamatayā tamo'
T11n1242u_001:45: ndhakāro ghaṭādipratibandhaṃ karoti tathāvidyāpi viparītagrāhitayā pratibandhaṃ karoti |
T11n1242u_001:48: manastamasi tānavaṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāso vā vacanapramātho draṣṭavyaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:49: manastamastānavamādadhānāstanutvaṃ kurvānāḥ sakalajanasya śruticittābhāvanākrameṇa sugatasya vācaḥ sūtrābhidharmavinayatripiṭakasvabhāvā jayatti
T11n1242u_001:51: yasmādbhagavatpravacane pramāṇaparicchinna upāyo vimuktilakṣaṇa upeyaśca nirdiśyate teṣāṃ cāgama upāyopeyayoḥ pramāṇarahitatvāttato bhagavata eva vāco jayatti nānyeṣāmiti bhagavataḥ stutiḥ |
T11n1242u_001:53: bhidheyasyaiva prayojanaṃ na samyagjñānavyutpatteḥ śāstraprayojanasya prayojanam |
T11n1242u_001:55: sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ prayojanaṃ yena syātprayojanaprayojanaṃ tena ca prayojanaprayojanamākhyātamiti dūṣitaṃ sāmarthyāt |
T11n1242u_001:56: atha kasmātprakaraṇasyābhidheyaprayojanami tyevamuktaṃ na punaḥ prakaraṇasya śarīraprayojanamityāha dvividhaṃ hītyāhi |
T11n1242u_001:57: yato dvividhaṃ prakaraṇasya śarīraṃ prakaraṇasya svabhāvaḥ tasmādabhidheyeti viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtam |
T11n1242u_001:58: nanu yathābhidheyasya prayojanaṃ cintyate tathā śabdasyāpi kimiti na cintyata ityāha tatretyādi |
T11n1242u_001:66: nanu ca yatrābhidheyaprayojanaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttāvaṅgaṃ tathā saṃbandhādīnyapi |
T11n1242u_001:67: atastāni kimiti na kathyanta ityāha asminnabhidheyaprayojane kathite tānyapi sāmarthyātkathitāni bhavantītyarthaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:72: abhidheyaprayojanameva sākṣādvācyatayā nirdiśyate abhidheyādīni tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā |
T11n1242u_001:75: na caikena vākyenārthatrayaṃ sākṣācchakyate darśayitumiti darśayati natvidamityādi |
T11n1242u_001:76: ekaṃ tvityādi vākyaṃ prādhānyenaikaṃ vadadabhidheyavyutpattiprayojanasaṃbandhārthatrayaṃ pratipādayati tatra tadityādinā |
T11n1242u_001:78: nanu ca tadyutpattiḥ kriyata ityevaṃ yujyate vaktuṃ kimiti tadyutpādyata iti ṇicā nirdeśa iti |
T11n1242u_001:80: atreti prakaraṇe vakturiti śāstrakartuḥ śrotuśca prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyate |
T11n1242u_001:81: yasmāddvayorapi vaktṛśrotrostatra prakaraṇe prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇākhyo vyāpārau staḥ |
T11n1242u_001:82: kimiti punastayoḥ karaṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ cintyata ityāha tathāhītyādi |
T11n1242u_001:83: tata ācāryeṇetyādinā dvayorvyāpārasya prayojanaṃ darśayati yasmādanena samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyata ityatra vākye vyutpattikriyāniṣpattau karaṇaśravaṇakriyādvayakartavyatayā praviṣṭam |
T11n1242u_001:84: tacca vyutpattikaraṇaṃ śāstrakārasyaiva nānyasyeti ṇicā nidarśitam |
T11n1242u_001:85: yasmātsamyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyamānāñśiṣyānprerayati vyutpāditaṃ samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyadhvamityātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartumārabdhaṃ prakaraṇam |
T11n1242u_001:86: tasmādvaktureva karaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanaṃ na bhājanādīnām |
T11n1242u_001:87: yadyapi tairvinā vyutpādanaṃ na bhavati tathāpi na tāni vyutpādakāni teṣāṃ śiṣyaviṣaye prerakatvābhāvāt |
T11n1242u_001:88: śiṣyaiścetyādi yasmācchiṣyā ācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimātmanaḥ saṃbandhinīṃ kartumicchatti yataste pracodyāstasmāttatprakaraṇaṃ taiḥ śrūyata iti śravaṇasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam |
T11n1242u_001:90: anyathāsādharaṇavyāpāro vakturvyutpattau na darśitaḥ syāt śiṣyāṇaṃ ca śravaṇavyāpāraśca |
T11n1242u_001:91: yasmātsarva evaṃ prayojakaparatantro bhavati asati ṇici śiṣyā aprayojyāḥ ye cāprayojyāḥ te svatantrāḥ svatantrāṇāṃ cācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimanicchatāṃ śravaṇabhāvātkathaṃ śravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyata iti sthitam |
T11n1242u_001:92: nanu ca yathābhidheyavyutpādanaprayojanayorapoddhāreṇa pratipādakapadaṃ kathaṃ saṃbandhasyāpi kimiti na kathitamityāha saṃbandhapradarśanapadaṃ tvityādi |
T11n1242u_001:93: ayameva prakaraṇaviśeṣo laghūpāyatayā vakṣyamāṇayā nītyopāyo vyutpādanamupeyam |
T11n1242u_001:95: sa ca pratīyata iti na padāntareṇa kathitaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:99: evamādivākyenābhidheyaprayojanādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānāṃ pravṛttau tadasaṃgatameveti manyamānaścodayati nanvityādinā |
T11n1242u_001:101: yo hi prāmāṇikaḥ sa pramāṇe pravartate |
T11n1242u_001:102: na cādivākye prayojanādinā kathitena śāstraśravaṇātprāgvartate śāstraṃ ādivākyasyāprāmāṇyāt |
T11n1242u_001:108: yadyasyāpramāṇaṃ prayojanapratipādakamādivacanaṃ tathāpi śāstrādau pratipādanīyaṃ arthasaṃśayajananārtham |
T11n1242u_001:109: yo hi samyagjñānārthī sa tathābhūta śāstrakarturādivākyaṃ śrutvā tatra saṃśete saṃśayācca pravartata iti tātparyam |
T11n1242u_001:110: ata eveti yata evādivākyenārthasaṃśayaḥ saṃśayācca pravṛttirata eva śāstrakāreṇaiva yujyate vaktuṃ nākhyānakartreti |
T11n1242u_001:111: tena yaduktaṃ kenacidyākhyānakārā eva prayojanādīni pratipādayiṣyantīti tatpratyuktam |
T11n1242u_001:113: yadyapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti mahatā prabandhane śāstrakaraṇātsaṃbhāvyata ityarthaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:114: nanu ca bādhakasādhakapramāṇābhāvātsamyagjñānavyutpattyathī vināpyādivacanena saṃśayānastatra pravartata iti kimādivākyena tatroktenetyāha anukteṣvityādi
T11n1242u_001:117: yo hi kākadattaparīkṣādiśāstraṃ dṛṣṭvā prayojanādirahitaṃ atrāpyaprayojanādīnsaṃbhāvayannanarthaṃ saṃśete anarthasaṃśayācca na pravartate taṃ pratyetatkathanasya prayojanam |
T11n1242u_001:118: kathite ca vacane śāstrakāreṇa tadanurodhādvacanādarthasaṃśayo jāyate tataḥ pravartata ityarthaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:120: ato vā prakaraṇadanyasya prakaraṇasya laghutaropāyatāṃ saṃbhāvyāsya prakaraṇasyāsāratayā anupāyatā syādityarthaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:121: evaṃ samudāyena vākyasyaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāyāvayavārthaṃ darśayitumāha avisaṃvādakamityādi |
T11n1242u_001:122: avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānamiti bruvatā ṭīkākṛtārthāvabodhakaṃ jñānaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitamarthadarśanaṃ ca cārvākopakalpitamathāpi viparītaṃ jñānaṃ kaiścitparikalpitaṃ samyaktvena tannirastaṃ sarvaṃ eteṣāṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇābhāvāt |
T11n1242u_001:123: yathā ca na tāni samyagjñānāni tathā svayaṃ ṭīkāyāmapahastitāni |
T11n1242u_001:124: ekasminnevārthe trayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ pradarśakapravartakaprāpakabhedena prāmāṇyamiṣṭaṃ pareṇa |
T11n1242u_001:126: pradarśite cārtha prathamena darśakena jñānena yaddvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivārthe puruṣasya pravartakaṃ tṛtīyamapi tatraivārthe prāpakaṃ tato nādyādadhikaṃ prāpaṇayogyīkaraṇeneti tadeva pramāṇam |
T11n1242u_001:131: yatpradarśakamādāvutpannamarthe jñānaṃ tadeva pravṛttiviṣayaṃ karoti pravṛttiviṣayayogyīkarotītyarthaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:132: na tu dvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ ādyenaiva pravṛttiviṣayayogyīkṛtatvāt |
T11n1242u_001:135: kuto'yaṃ labhyate yadā prathamaṃ darśayatyeva na pravartayati na prāpayati |
T11n1242u_001:140: nanu ca yadyapyarthādhigatireva pramāṇaphalaṃ tathāpi yāvaduttare pravartakaprāpakajñāne na bhavatastatrārthe tāvanna pramāṇavyāpāraparisamāptirityāha adhigata ityādi |
T11n1242u_001:142: adhigate cārthe samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāra iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye kartavye'
T11n1242u_001:147: sa ca niścayaḥ prathamayā cārthādhigatvā kṛta iti samāpto vyāpārastāvataiva puruṣasya pravṛtteḥ |
T11n1242u_001:151: pravartitaḥ puruṣa iti pravartanayogyatvātpravartita ityucyate prāpaṇayogyatvātprāpitaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:152: evaṃ sāmānyena saṃvādakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣānumāṇe svavyāpāraṃ kurvatī samyagjñāne bhavata iti darśayannāha tatra
T11n1242u_001:161: tacca vahnyavyabhicāridhūmaniścayanaṃ sāmanyena sādhyāvinābhāvi ca smaraṇajñānam |
T11n1242u_001:162: yathā dhūmaṃ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā sarvatrāyaṃ vahnija iti smaraṇaṃ tasmātliṅgajñānānniścinvatpravṛttiviṣayaṃ darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:163: tadanumānaṃ viśiṣṭasaṃbandhena yadudeti jñānaṃ yathātratyo dhūmo vahnija iti jñānam |
T11n1242u_001:166: anumānasya tu liṅgadarśanātsvaviṣaye niścayātmanotpattireva niścayavyāpāra iti |
T11n1242u_001:169: nānyadvijñānamityevaṃ bruvataite eva samyagjñāne nānyāni śabdādīni teṣāṃ niyatārthānupadarśakatvāditi samyagjñānasya pravṛttiḥ darśitā |
T11n1242u_001:170: yathaite pramāṇe saṃśayādijñānaṃ na tathā pramāṇam |
T11n1242u_001:173: yathā pratyakṣānumāne svena svena pramāṇenopadarśitārthasya prāpake na tathā saṃśayaviparyayajñāne tathābhūtasyārthasyābhāvāditi |
T11n1242u_001:174: nanu ca mā bhūtsaṃśayaviparyayajñānayoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ tathābhūtasyārthasyāsattvāditi yatpunariha kūpe jalamiti jñānaṃ tatpramāṇāntaraṃ kimiti na bhavati na tāvatpratyakṣaṃ tatra jalasya parokṣatvāt |
T11n1242u_001:180: yadyapi sākṣātsaṃśayajñānaṃ na pratīyate yastu saṃśayaḥ vikalpakasya jñānasya iha kūpe jalamityevaṃjātīyasya tathāpi niyāmakaṃ liṅgamattareṇa tadapramāṇaṃ niyatārthaparicchedāt |
T11n1242u_001:182: yatpunastatra pravṛttena kadācijjalaṃ labhyate tajjñānāntarāditi viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ pratipāditam |
T11n1242u_001:183: nanu ca yadyapi saṃśayādīnāmupadarśitārthasya prāpakatvaṃ nāsti kiṃ tāni na vyutpādyanta ityāha arthakriyārthibhiścetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:185: nanu ca yadyupadarśitārthaprāpaṇātpramāṇaṃ samyagjñānaṃ śuklaśaṅkhe pītajñānaṃ kuñcikāvivare maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇijñānaṃ ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svaprajñānaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ prāpnotītyebhirupadarśitasyārthamātrasya prāptestataśca samyagjñānamityāśaṅkyāha arthādhigamātmakaṃ hītyādi |
T11n1242u_001:187: ebhirupadarśitasyārthasya pītākārasya kuñcikāvivarasthasya maṇerniyatadeśasya niyatakālasya cārdharātre'
T11n1242u_001:188: prāpaṇāt deśakālavyatiriktasyāvayavāderabhāvāt ata eva tānyapramāṇānyeva na samyagjñānānīti |
T11n1242u_001:192: deśākārābhyāṃ niyatasya prāptuṃ śakyatvādbhavatvanyākārasyānyadeśasya ca prāptāvapramāṇam |
T11n1242u_001:199: styeva kiṃ tu kṣaṇāpekṣayā na prāmāṇyalakṣaṇamucyate api tu saṃtānāpekṣayā |
T11n1242u_001:200: tataśca nīlādau ya eva saṃtānaḥ paricchinno nīlajñānena sa eva tena prāpitaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:202: na tathā sthūlakālabhedena pradarśitasya putrasya svaprajñānam |
T11n1242u_001:205: sa ca hetuhetumadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavati yadi saṃtānāpekṣayā prāmāṇyamavatiṣṭhate na kṣaṇāpekṣayeti |
T11n1242u_001:207: kathaṃ pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇe vartata ityāha kāryādityādi |
T11n1242u_001:208: kāraṇaśabda eva kasmānna kṛta ityāha kāraṇaśabda ityādi |
T11n1242u_001:209: kimanantarakāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ saṃbhavati yadapekṣayā vyavahitasya grahaṇārthaṃ pūrvaśabdagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityāha dvividhamityādi nanu kimucyate arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ jñānamanantaraṃ kāraṇaṃ naṃ hi tatkāraṇajñānaṃ kiṃ tarhi phalajñānam |
T11n1242u_001:210: evaṃ tu yujyate vaktuṃ yatsādhananirbhāsyanantaraṃ jñānamarthakriyānirbhāsajñānamupajanayati tatsādhanajñānamanantarakāraṇamityucyate |
T11n1242u_001:213: arthakriyā yā nirbhāsaḥ pratibimbanaṃ tadākārajñānotpattiryasmādanantarajñānāttatsādhanajñānaṃ tadarthakriyānirbhāsaṃ sādhanajñānam |
T11n1242u_001:216: yadyevamanantarameva kimiti na parīkṣyata ityāha yatraiva hītyādi |
T11n1242u_001:218: rthakriyāsamarthavastupravartake puruṣasya saṃdehastadeva parīkṣyate na cānattarasādhanajñāne saṃdehastadanattaraṃ sukhaduḥkhapratibhāsajñānodayāt
T11n1242u_001:219: tayoranubhave sati sādhanajñānātpravartituṃ vā yujyata iti na parīkṣāhaṃ yadvārthakriyānirbhāsasyānayā yuktyā na parīkṣārhatvamiti |
T11n1242u_001:225: tena hyevaṃ vyākhyātaṃ arthaśabdena prayojanamucyate puruṣasya prayojanaṃ dārupākādi |
T11n1242u_001:229: dharmottaravyākhyāne tu heyopādeyārthaviṣayā yā siddhiranuṣṭhitiḥ sā samyagjñānapūrviketi na doṣaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:233: tasya kimiti na kathanamityāha na ca heyetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:238: tena yaduktaṃ kaiścidveyopādeyayoḥ puruṣārthopayogitvātkathanaṃ upekṣaṇīyasya tadviparyayānna kathanamiti tatpratyuktam |
T11n1242u_001:240: uttareṇa granthena sarvaśabda ityādinā ṭīkākṛtāṃ vyākhyāṃ dūṣayati |
T11n1242u_001:243: na tu sarvā hānopādānārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānādevāpi tu mithyājñānādapi kākatālīyetyāśaṅkā parihṛtam |
T11n1242u_001:252: tra draṣṭavyaḥ kārtsnye vartate sarvaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭamiti |
T11n1242u_001:253: tenāyamarthaḥ yāvatī kṛtsnārthasiddhirhānopādānalakṣaṇā sarvā samyagjñānādeva na mithyājñānāt mithyājñānādarthaprāptyasiddheriti |
T11n1242u_001:255: dviprakārāpītyādinā paravyākhyāṃ darśayati api tvayamartha ityādinātmīṣāṃ vyākhyām |
T11n1242u_001:256: tato yāvadbrūyādi tyādinopasaṃhāravyājenaivaśabdena prayuktenāvadhāraṇārthavācinā yāvānarthastāvāneva sarvaśabdena prayuktena kṛtsnārthavācinā bhavatīti darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:257: nanu bahuvrīhiṇā puruṣārthasiddhirucyate tasyāḥ prādhānyāttacchabdena saṃbandho yukto na samyagjñānasyetyāha yadyapītyādi |
T11n1242u_001:262: nanu ca kimidaṃ jñānasya vyutpādanaṃ kiṃ jñānasyotpādanamuta doṣāpanayanamatha svanūpakathanamiti |
T11n1242u_001:267: nāpi svanūpakathanaṃ yujyate niṣprayojanatvātprakaraṇasyetyāśaṅkyāha vyutpādyata iti vipratipattinirākaraṇeneti |
T11n1242u_001:272: tāmeva vipratipattiṃ krameṇa darśayati catuḥprakārā saṃkhyālakṣaṇetyādinā |
T11n1242u_001:275: tathā hi mīmāṃsakāḥ pratyakṣānumānaśabdopamānārthāpattyabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ padavyākhyāyuktaṃ samyagjñānaṃ manyatte |
T11n1242u_001:279: nanu ca samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇe kathite sati paścāttadbhedaḥ pradarśayituṃ yujyate itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇaṃ samyagjñānaṃ dvividhamiti tatkimityādāveva pradarśitamityāha vyaktibhede cetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:282: kathite samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇameva na śakyate kathayituṃ yataḥ pratyakṣasyānyatlakṣaṇamanumānasya cānyat |
T11n1242u_001:283: saṃkhyābhede tu kathite lakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ śakyate kathayitumityato lakṣaṇāṅgamevādau saṃkhyābhedakathanamiti |
T11n1242u_001:284: nanu ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ceti nirdeśāddvividhamiti labdham |
T11n1242u_001:287: dvividhameva samyagjñānamityavadhāraṇārthaṃ tenaikatricaturā saṃkhyā nirastā syāt |
T11n1242u_001:294: tataśca pratyakṣā buddhiḥ pratyakṣo ghaṭa iti na syāt |
T11n1242u_001:295: idameva syātpratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kuṇḍaṃ ceti |
T11n1242u_001:297: nanu ca pratigatamakṣamityasyāṃ vyutpattāvakṣāśritasyaivendriyajñānasya pratyakṣaśabdavācyatā syāt na yogijñānādeiḥ teṣāmakṣānāśrayādityāśaṅkyāha akṣāśritatvaṃ cetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:302: atrāpi paścānmānamanumānami tyavyapībhāvasamāse pūrvavajrodyamudrāvya gatisamāsa āśrayitavyaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:303: anugataṃ mānamanumānamiti paścādityarthakathanaṃ kṛtaṃ na tasminvākye samāsaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:304: cakāraḥ pratyakṣānumānayostulyabalatvaṃ samuccinotītyādinā yaduktaṃ śabarasvāmiprabhṛtibhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pramāṇaṃ nānumānaṃ tathā coktaṃ mīmāṃsabhāṣye pratyakṣe balīyasi kathamanumānamiti tatpratyuktaṃ yato dvayorapi svavyāpāre tulyabalatvam |
T11n1242u_001:312: etaccāyuktaṃ yasmādekavibhaktinirdeśe kriyāmāṇe cakāreṇa tulyabalatvaṃ na pradarśitaṃ syāditi |
T11n1242u_001:316: anena lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyānaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhanūpaṃ pratyuktam |
T11n1242u_001:319: yadyapyanvarthasaṃjñayā kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yadbhrāntaṃ ca tatpratyakṣamiti śakyate yathārthaṃ kathayituṃ tathāpi na svanūpaṃ pratyakṣasya kathitaṃ syāt yato'
T11n1242u_001:320: nyadapi pratyakṣasya svanūpamarthasākṣātkārādikamastīti lakṣyalakṣaṇe tu yathārthaṃ kathite kathitaṃ bhavati |
T11n1242u_001:322: ata eva na lakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ saṃjñākaraṇaṃ bhavati saṃjñākaraṇatvenāpratīterlakṣaṇakaraṇasya |
T11n1242u_001:323: śabdamanūdyānityatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate na cānityatvaṃ saṃjñeti gamyata iti saṃjñālakṣaṇakaraṇayorbhedaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:324: yastvanayoḥ pradeśāntaraprasiddhayoranuvādaṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣatvaṃ vidadhāti tenāpyatra lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo viparītamākhyātaṃ bhaṅgyā yato lakṣaṇavidhānakāle lakṣyamanūdya lakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate na tu lakṣaṇamanūdya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate |
T11n1242u_001:325: siddhe tu lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve sati lakṣaṇamanūdya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate yathā yaḥ śikhāvānsa parivrājaka iti |
T11n1242u_001:326: śikhālakṣaṇavidhānakāle tu parivrājakānuvādena śikhaiva vidhīyate na viparītavidhānamityanyadapyasminyakṣe dūṣaṇaṃ dattaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ ṭīkākṛteti tatraiva draṣṭavyam |
T11n1242u_001:327: nanu ca lakṣaṇavidhipakṣe pratyakṣasyādyāpyasiddhatvādanūdyaṃ na saṃbhavati tataśca kathaṃ pratyakṣalakṣyamanūdya lakṣaṇaṃ vijñāpyate |
T11n1242u_001:328: yathā śikhayā prarivrājaka ityitra śikhālakṣaṇamanūdya kalpanāpoḍhādi vidhīyata ityāśaṅkyāha yattadbhavatāmityādi |
T11n1242u_001:330: yadyapi kalpanāpoḍhatvena pratyakṣaṃ na prasiddhaṃ tathāpyarthasākṣātkāritvena sāmānyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasiddham |
T11n1242u_001:332: nanu ca tayoraprasiddhatvātpratyakṣasyāprasiddhireva pratyakṣasya tatsvabhāvatvādityāśaṅkyāha na caitanmantavyamityādi subodham |
T11n1242u_001:342: etacca lakṣaṇadvayamityādinā padadvayena vipratipattinirāsaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyā padadvayavyavacchedakathananūpā dūṣitā |
T11n1242u_001:345: evaṃ satyanumānasyāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ tannivṛttyartham |
T11n1242u_001:346: yadyevaṃ vyākhyāyate ālambane yanna bhrāntaṃ tadabhrāntamityevamucyamāne sarvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānamālambane bhrāntamiti na kasyacitpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt | tathā cāha |
T11n1242u_001:349: na tadapyatrācāryeṇa saṃgṛhītamiti tadayuktaṃ yata ācāryeṇa vipratipattinirāsārthaṃ padadvayaṃ kṛtaṃ na vyavacchedārtham |
T11n1242u_001:352: pi kimiti vyavacchedārthaṃ na bhavatītyāha etaccetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:356: api tvarthakriyākṣame vastunūpa ālambane yanna bhrāmyati tadabhrāntaśabdena gṛhyate |
T11n1242u_001:360: yogācāramatena tvabhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyaṃ saṃvādakasya samyagjñānasya prastutatvāt anyavyāvartyasyābhāvāt |
T11n1242u_001:365: yathā nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ tathā jātyādiyojanājñānamapi samyagjñānamindriyajaṃ upadarśitasyārthasya prāpaṇāt |
T11n1242u_001:373: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamarśinī ||
T11n1242u_001:374: na so'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte |
T11n1242u_001:376: tathā naiyāyikādīnāṃ savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamiti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirākriyate |
T11n1242u_001:378: bhrāntagrahaṇamatiricyamānaṃ dvicandrajñānādeḥ samyagjñānādhikaraṇa evaṃ nirastatvādvipratipattinirāsārthatvameva bhavati |
T11n1242u_001:379: tathācāryaikadeśīyāḥ śukle śaṅkhe pītajñānaṃ gacchadvṛkṣadarśanajñānaṃ cālātacakrajñānamabhrāntamapi samyagjñānamicchanti vastuno'
T11n1242u_001:383: tathā sati abhrāntagrahaṇa ityādinābhrāntaśabdasya vipratipattiviṣayaṃ darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:390: bhrāntārtha iti tasyārthasya grahaṇe doṣaṃ darśayati na tvavisaṃvādakamityādinā |
T11n1242u_001:391: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanetyādinā kalpanābahutvātkasyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ grahaṇamiti kalpanāviśeṣamajñānanpṛcchati |
T11n1242u_001:392: tathā hi vaibhāṣikā indriyavijñānaṃ vitarkavicāracaitasikasaṃprayuktaṃ kalpanāmicchanti |
T11n1242u_001:393: yogācāramatena ca tathāgatajñānamadvayaṃ muktvā sarvajñānaṃ grāhyagrāhakatvena vikalpitaṃ kalpanā |
T11n1242u_001:395: abhilāpetyādinā śabdasaṃsṛṣṭasya vikalpasya grahaṇaṃ nāgamaparipaṭhitānāmiti darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:399: tena vinītadevavyākhyā dūṣitā abhilapyata ityabhilāpaḥ vācyaḥ sāmānyādirityevaṃnūpā |
T11n1242u_001:400: evamevedamāśrayaṇīyamanyathā yogyagrahaṇena śabdasaṃsargayogyo na kathitaḥ syāditi |
T11n1242u_001:401: yadyevaṃ dharmottaravyākhyāne jātyādervācyasya saṃsargabhāvo na pradarśitaḥ syāt |
T11n1242u_001:405: nanu ca yadyapi tasmiñjñāna ākārayormīlanaṃ tathāpi śabdārthayoḥ saṃsargo nāstītyāha |
T11n1242u_001:411: nanu cāvyutpannasaṃketasya bālamūkāderanumato vijñāne na śabdasaṃsarga iti tadyotyatvamapi nāsti |
T11n1242u_001:420: tataśca vyāvartyābhāvādyogyagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamityāśaṅkāṃ parasya darśayati asatyabhilāpetyadinā |
T11n1242u_001:432: nanu ca bālasya tālvādikaraṇapāṭavābhāve sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdoccāraṇaṃ nāsti tatkimucyate sa evāyamiti |
T11n1242u_001:433: satyaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu sa evāyamityanena vikalpasyāvasthocyate |
T11n1242u_001:438: bālasyāpi pūrvāparaparāmarśanūpaṃ vikalpakaṃ vijñānamasti niyataviṣaye pravṛtteḥ yathā gṛhītasaṃketasya pūrvāparaparāmarśena pravṛttiriti |
T11n1242u_001:440: tadaniyatapratibhāsaṃ pūrvāparayorāropitatvāditi saṃsargayogyaṃ bālamūkādervijñānamiti tannivṛttyartha yogyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti sthitam |
T11n1242u_001:441: indriyavijñānamityādinā kumārilena yadindriyavijñānasyālocanākhyasya bālamūkādivijñānena sādṛśyaṃ pratipāditaṃ taddūṣayitumupasaṃhāravyājena vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:443: ata eva svalakṣaṇasyāpi śabdasyārthasya ca vācyavācakatvamabhyupagamya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya sādhyate |
T11n1242u_001:446: yadyapītyanena svalakṣaṇayorvācyavācakabhāvābhyupagamaṃ darśayati paramārthataḥ sāmānyayoreva vācyavācakatvaṃ nārthaśabdaviśeṣasyetyādinā nyāyena
T11n1242u_001:452: tena yadvinītadevena sāmānyayorvāghyavācakabhāvamaṅgīkṛtya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya pratipāditaṃ taddūṣitaṃ bhaṅgyā |
T11n1242u_001:457: yadā ghaṭaśabdaḥ śabdaśabdo vā śabdaṃ śabdena pratipadyate tadā kiṃcidvācyaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ kiṃcidvācakaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇamiti |
T11n1242u_001:458: tataḥ śruddhayoḥ śravaṇe sati śabdavijñāne dvayorapi śabdayoḥ pratibhāsanācchrotrendriyajñānamaniyatapratibhāsitvātsavikalpakaṃ syādityākūtam
T11n1242u_001:461: yadyapi svalakṣaṇayorvācyavācakatvaṃ tathāpi śrotravijñāne na vācyavācakatayā tayoḥ pratibhāsanaṃ api tu śuddhayoreva pratibhāsanaṃ yasmācchabdasaṃnidhibalena śrotravijñānamutpadyate |
T11n1242u_001:463: yāvatsaṃketakālabhāviśabdasmaraṇaṃ na bhavati tāvatkuto vācyatvaṃ vācakatvaṃ vā syāt etatpratyabhijñayā sa evāyaṃ vācako bhaviṣyatītyāha |
T11n1242u_001:466: kaśca saṃketaviṣayaḥ śabdo yaḥ saṃketakālabhāvinā jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:467: yaśca pūrvajñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ sa idānīṃ nāsti pūrvajñānavināśe pūrvajñānaviṣayatvasyābhāvāt |
T11n1242u_001:469: yogijñānena yadyekasminkāle manovijñānena ca yugapacchandārthau gṛhīte tathāpi saṃnihitavastutayā tena gṛhītavyāviti darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:471: nanu kalpanājñānamapi parayā kalpanayā śūnyaṃ tataśca tasyāpi nirvikalpakatvaṃ prāpnotītyāśaṅkyāha |
T11n1242u_001:475: tra kalpanātvaṃ lakṣyate yathā viṣāṇītyatra viṣāṇitvaṃ tataśca kalpanātvena rahitaṃ yajjñānaṃ tannirvikalpakam |
T11n1242u_001:477: kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvayorlakṣaṇayoḥ parasparaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ na svātantryeṇa pṛthaglakṣaṇatvamiti darśayitumante pratyakṣaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā tayorapi saṃbadhnāti tatpratyakṣamiti pareṇa saṃbandha ityanena |
T11n1242u_001:486: bāhyā nauḥ sevāśrayastatra sthitasyāśrayadvārako vibhrama ucyate |
T11n1242u_001:490: nānyairindriyamagatairindriyaṃ vikriyāṃ gatamityāha sarvairevetyādi timirasya sākṣādalātādeḥ pāramparyeṇeti etacca viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ vistareṇa pratipāditamiti |
T11n1242u_001:491: saṃkṣobhapadena saha dvandvaṃ kṛtvā bahuvrīhiriti darśayati viniścaye tu saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ kṛtvādiśabdena bahuvrīhisamāsa darśayataḥ
T11n1242u_001:494: yadā saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ tadāśrayagatasya vibhramakāraṇasyopalakṣaṇatvādvātapittādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti nārthabhedaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:495: atha kimarthamāśubhramaṇagrahaṇāderupādānaṃ timirādītyeva kriyatāmādigrahaṇena sarveṣāṃ saṃgraho bhaviṣyati |
T11n1242u_001:499: teṣāmupādāne padyādigrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta tadā teṣāṃ svanūpagrahaṇameva syāt |
T11n1242u_001:501: tata ubhayopādāne sati timirādīnāmubhayakātsyarna labhyata iti sthitam |
T11n1242u_001:502: tat tathāvidhaṃ jñānamiti yadyapi sūtre jñānagrahaṇaṃ nāsti tathāpi bhrānte jñānadharmatvāttadyudāsena jñānameva pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata ityadoṣaḥ
T11n1242u_001:503: vinītadevavyākhyāyāṃ bhavati tu pratyakṣasūtrasyārthakathanaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti tasmātsthitaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣabhrāntamiti ||
T11n1242u_001:506: mānase ca pratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvita iti dvābhyāṃ bhikṣavo nūpaṃ dṛśyate cakṣurvijñānena tadākṛṣṭena manovijñāneneti tadāgamasiddhaṃ manovijñānamācāryadignāgena pratyakṣaṃ darśitaṃ tatparaiḥ kumārilādibhirlakṣaṇamajñānadbhirdūṣitam |
T11n1242u_001:507: tanmanojñānaṃ yadīndriyavijñānaviṣaye pravartate tadā gṛhītagrāhitayāpramāṇaṃ athānyaviṣaye pravartate vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ bhavatkiṃ tanmanovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ syānnirāpekṣaṃ vā |
T11n1242u_001:508: indriyasavyapekṣatve satīndiyavijñānameva nirāpekṣatve vānindriyasyāpi manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syādityandhabadhirādyabhāvacodya kṛtam |
T11n1242u_001:509: svasaṃvedanaṃ ca nābhyupagatamiti mīmāṃsakaiḥ parokṣaṃ vijñānamarthāpattigamyaṃ pratyakṣo'
T11n1242u_001:511: naiyāyikādibhistu jñānāntaragamyaṃ jñānamiṣyate na svasaṃvedanaṃ siddhaṃ svātmani kāritvavirodhāt |
T11n1242u_001:514: yogina eva na saṃprati pramāṇābhāvāt kiṃ punaḥ teṣāṃ jñānamiti indriyāśritamiti cakṣurādīndriyacatuṣṭayaṃ gṛhyate |
T11n1242u_001:515: na mana indriyaṃ tasya svasaṃvedanapratyakṣe pratipādyamānatvāt |
T11n1242u_001:516: indriyāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti bruvatā thismuc vārtikakṛtā na cakṣuḥ pramāṇamiti kathitaṃ bhavati yasmājjñānasyaivānvayavyatirekānuvidhānādrūpādidarśane sāmarthyaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:517: yatūktaṃ jñānaṃ cetpaśyati vyavahitamapi kiṃ na paśyati amūrtasyāvācakābhāvāditi tadayuktaṃ yato yogyadeśenaivārthena tajjñānaṃ janyate na vyavahitena vijñānādarśanāt |
T11n1242u_001:519: tasyānāntara ityasya vivaraṇaṃ na vidyata ityādi |
T11n1242u_001:525: nanu ca kathaṃ viṣayakṣaṇasya sahakāritvamekasminkṣaṇe upakāryopakārakabhāvābhāvādityata āha dvividhaścetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:530: yadā yogijñānaṃ parasyaivaṃvidhajñānamālambate tadālambanabhūtena yogijñānaṃ janyata iti |
T11n1242u_001:532: samanantara iti ca bhavati śakandhvādiṣu pāṭhāt paranūpatvaṃ yataḥ sa ceti samanantaraḥ hetutvāditi pratyayārthakathanametat |
T11n1242u_001:534: indriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇopādānabhūtena yajjanitaṃ tadeva manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na ālambanabhūtena janitamityarthaḥ
T11n1242u_001:535: yadā cetyādinā dvayorekaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhītvā yañcoditaṃ pareṇa tatparihṛtaṃ pūrvakṣaṇa indriyavijñānasya viṣayo dvitīyakṣaṇe manovijñānasya viṣaya ityagṛhītagrāhi manovijñānamiti |
T11n1242u_001:536: yadā cetyādinā yaccodyaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi manovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ na syānmanovijñānasyendriyavijñānaviṣayādanyo viṣayaḥ tadāndhabadirādyabhāvaḥ vyavahitasya nīlādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatviti tatparihṛtam |
T11n1242u_001:537: yasmādindriyavijñānaviṣayasya dvitīyopādeyabhūtaviṣayakṣaṇo gṛhīto manovijñānaviṣayaḥ tasmādyavahitakṣaṇo viṣayo na bhavatyasyāndhabadirādeścātīndriyavijñānam
T11n1242u_001:539: tena teṣāṃ na manovijñānaṃ bhavatīti parihṛtam |
T11n1242u_001:542: anyathā pañca bāhyā vijñeyā ityasya vyāghātaḥ syāt |
T11n1242u_001:543: svaviṣayānantaraviṣayaśabdena śrotravijñānaviṣayānantarayogyaviṣayo gṛhyate nopādeyakṣaṇa eva tena vijñānaviṣayadeśe'
T11n1242u_001:544: paraśabdo yadotpadyate tadā mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā janitaṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:547: yadā cakṣurviṣayamālocyoparataṃ bhavati tadālocanāviṣaye cakṣurvijñānamutpannaṃ satpunardvitīye kṣaṇa ātmīyaviṣayānantaraviṣayenotpādyata indriyāṇāṃ tatra vyāpārābhāvāt |
T11n1242u_001:548: tataśca tenendriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā mānasapratyakṣamutpadyata iti sthitam |
T11n1242u_001:549: nanvekasminkṣaṇe tasyotpādake sati na tatra kācidarthakriyāvāpyata iti puruṣārthānupayogitvātprāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti |
T11n1242u_001:552: te ca tasminkṣaṇe mānase copadarśitaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadya dharmadeśanādikāmarthakriyāmāsādayantītyinavadyam |
T11n1242u_001:553: atha vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kimiti mānasotpattirlupyata ityāha vyāpāravatityādi sarvendriyāśritaṃ jñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānameva na mānasasyotpattirastītyabhiprāyaḥ
T11n1242u_001:554: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇa indriyavijñānaṃ bhavati dvitīye kṣaṇe mānasaṃ bhavati yadyapi samānajātīyayoryugapadutpattirnāstītyāha itarathetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:556: vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kimitīndriyavijñānaṃ notpadyate dvitīye kṣaṇe yogyakaraṇe sati samānanūpaṃ tena tayoḥ kathamindriyavijñānavyapadeśo na syāditi
T11n1242u_001:557: nanu ca yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ indriyajñānādbhinnaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavettadā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ yāvatā pramāṇasiddhameva nāstītyāha etaccetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:558: evaṃjātīyakamitīndriyavijñānasadṛśaṃ tadetaddharmottareṇāgamasiddhaṃ darśayatācāryajñānagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mānasasiddhaye yatpramāṇamupanyastaṃ vikalpodayāditi tadbhaṅgyāvadhāraṇādeva dūṣitam |
T11n1242u_001:559: tairevaṃ vyākhyātaṃ vyāpāravati cakṣuṣīndriyajñānamutpadyate mānasaṃ ca |
T11n1242u_001:561: yataḥ samānendriyayornāsti na bhinnendriyayoḥ ṣaṇāṃ yugapadutpattiriti vacanāt |
T11n1242u_001:563: na ca tatra bhedenānupalabhyamānaṃ mānasaṃ nāstīti śakyate vaktuṃ samānajātīyanīlavikalpodayāt |
T11n1242u_001:564: yadi ca tanna mānasaṃ syāttatpṛṣṭhabhāvī nīlavikalpā ne syādeva |
T11n1242u_001:566: yathā deevadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīlaniścayo bhavati |
T11n1242u_001:572: na ca vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi mānasasyotpattirasti na ca dvayornīlavijñānayorutpattirnirvikalpayordṛśyate anupalabhyamānatvāttayoḥ |
T11n1242u_001:575: yena bhinnasaṃtānānnirvikalpakādutpattirna syādekasaṃtānapātitvāttayoravaśyaṃ cāṅgīkartavyā vijātīyā vikalpasyotpattiryena vārtikakāra evamāha
T11n1242u_001:579: tataśca tatsāmarthyabhāvi kathaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ smaraṇaṃ vijātīyatvāt |
T11n1242u_001:580: na ca tatra mānasaṃ saṃviducyata indriyavijñānasya vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyasya cintyatvāt |
T11n1242u_001:581: kiṃ cendriyavijñānasya kathaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ yadi svavyāpāraṃ karoti |
T11n1242u_001:584: nanu cittacaittā iti vaktavye sarvagrahaṇasya vyāvartyābhāvādapārthakaṃ tadgrahaṇamityāha sukhādaya evetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:585: na kevalaṃ prasiddhāḥ sukhādayaḥ cittacaittā svasaṃvedanā gṛhyatte anye'
T11n1242u_001:589: evaṃ bruvatā ṭīkākṛtānena nirodhasamāpattyavasthāyāṃ śuddhacittābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ na kāciccittāvasthā saṃvedyate yataḥ |
T11n1242u_001:590: nanu cittacaittā nāmātmasaṃvedanaṃ nāsti syātmani kāritvavirodhādityuktamityāha yena hītyādi |
T11n1242u_001:593: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśatayaṃ svanūpaṃ nivedayannātmaprakāśane na pradīpāttaramapekṣate tathā cittādikamapi saṃvidrūpatayā svanūpaṃ nivedayannātmasaṃvedane na jñānāttaramapekṣate |
T11n1242u_001:594: na ca svātmani kāritvavirodho yato vāstavakārakatvābhāvaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:596: tatrāpi nīlākārotpattireva prakāśakatvaṃ jñānasya pradīpasyāpi prāgbhāvitvameva |
T11n1242u_001:599: tataśca vijñānaṃ bodhanūpatayā pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ kathamapahnūyate bhavatā parokṣaṃ vijñānamiti |
T11n1242u_001:602: pi bāhyanūpāḥ sukhādaya iti manyate taṃ pratyāha iha ca nūpādo dṛśyamāna ityādi |
T11n1242u_001:604: nīlanūpātsātādikamantaraṃ saṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ na bāhyenābhinnanūpaṃ jaḍanūpaṃ ca śakyate vaktumiti |
T11n1242u_001:605: amumevārthaṃ na ca gṛhyamānākāra ityādinā darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:608: na ca nīlasya sātanūpatvamanugamyata iti tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā vikalpena sātanūpo nīlādirnānugamyata ityarthaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:609: tena nīlādiḥ sātasvabhāvo na pratyakṣasiddha iti sāṃkhyaṃ nirākurvatā grāhyagrāhakaṃ sātādinūpaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pradarśitam |
T11n1242u_001:610: tena yuktamuktaṃ keścit grāhyādbhinnaṃ grāhakaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyata iti tena kiṃcinnāma nāpahnutaṃ bhavatītyuktam |
T11n1242u_001:623: tadiha sphuṭābhatvārambhe tyādinopasaṃhāravyājena yogino manovijñānasyāvasthātrayaṃ darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:624: bhāvanāprakarṣāvasthekā prakarṣaparyantāvasthā dvitīyā bhāvyamānasya karatalāmalakavaddarśanaṃ yoginaḥ tṛtīyāvastheti |
T11n1242u_001:627: iti nyāyādyadyapi manojñānena bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajena śabdārthauo yugapadgṛhyete tathāpi dvayoḥ svanūpasya sannihitatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāttadgrāhi vijñānaṃ nirvikalpakamiti |
T11n1242u_001:628: nuna ca manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratibhāsate yathā tathaiva bhāvyamānaṃ prakarṣaparyantajaṃ manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakapratibhāsi sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati |
T11n1242u_001:630: pamityanaikāntiko heturiti paccoditaṃ pareṇa tatparihartumupakramate vikalpavijñānaṃ hītyādinā |
T11n1242u_001:632: yadyapi manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭapratibhāsi tathāpi sphuṭābhatvāvasthāyāṃ tadalīkākāraṃ vācyavācakanūpamapaiti vittinūpaṃ tu tasya nijam
T11n1242u_001:633: atastadeva cidrūpaṃ jñānaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati na vācyavācakākāratayā tayorāropitanūpatvāt |
T11n1242u_001:634: āropitanūpagrahaṇasphuṭatvameva na syāditi nānaikāntikatvaṃ hetoḥ sphuṭābhatvādityasya |
T11n1242u_001:635: yadā tu vikalpavijñānaṃ śabdasaṃsargayogyavastu gṛhṇāti tadā saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena tadvastu gṛhṇāti |
T11n1242u_001:638: tacca pūrvavijñānaṃ saṃprati śabdasaṃsargayogyavastugrahaṇakāle nāsti kṣaṇikatvājjñānasya |
T11n1242u_001:639: tadvatpūrvavijñānaviṣayatvamapi saṃprati nāsti viṣayiṇo jñānasyābhāve viṣayasyāpyarthasya saṃketakālabhāvinojbhāva ityasaṃnihataṃ saṃketakālabhāvi tadvastvāropya gṛhṇadvikalpavijñānamasphuṭaṃ bhavatīti |
T11n1242u_001:642: tataḥ sphuṭatvānnirvikalpakaṃ yogijñānamabhrāntaṃ ca pramāṇena śuddhārthagrāhitvātsaṃvādakam |
T11n1242u_001:645: prakārabhedamiti pratyakṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ nirvikalpakamabhrāntaṃ tasya prakārabheda indriyajñānādiḥ |
T11n1242u_001:648: iha kaiścinmīmāṃsakādimiḥ pratyakṣasya sāmānyaviśeṣau dvāvapi viṣayau kalpitau |
T11n1242u_001:650: sāṃkhyena dvayorapi viśeṣo viṣaya iṣṭaḥ sāmānyasyābhāvāt |
T11n1242u_001:651: vedāntavādinā ca sāmānyameva viṣayo dvayoḥ ātmadvaitatayā sarvasyaikatvādviśeṣe bhrāntatvāddvayoriti vipratipattiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣaye |
T11n1242u_001:660: tatrāsādhāraṇatattvaṃ pratyakṣasya grāhyaviṣaya iti darśayati yadasādhāraṇamityādinā |
T11n1242u_001:661: nanu kimucyate grāhyaviṣaya iti yāvatā kimanyo viṣayo'
T11n1242u_001:664: yamadhyavasyatīti yaṃ saṃtānanūpeṇa sthitamarthaṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā vikalpena niścinoti |
T11n1242u_001:665: nanu ca kathaṃ pratyakṣasya saṃtāno viṣayo yato vikalpasyāsau viṣayaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:678: nanu pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya ityukte sāmānyamapi tasya viṣaya iti tadapi svalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti praśnaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:679: asaṃnidhānaṃ dūradeśāvasthānamiti bruvatā vinītadevasya vyākhyā dūṣitā |
T11n1242u_001:680: tena hyevaṃ vyākhyātaṃ sarveṇa nūpeṇa vastuno'
T11n1242u_001:683: etadasaṃgataṃ yasmādvastunaḥ tatrābhāve jñānameva na bhavati |
T11n1242u_001:689: nanu sāmānyameva dūre gṛhyamāṇamasphuṭapratibhāsaṃ na svalakṣaṇamityāha sarvāṇyevetyādi sāmānyasyāvidyamānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:690: ataḥ tānyeva svalakṣaṇāni sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsīni na sāmānyam |
T11n1242u_001:691: nanu yadi dūrāsannābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ nūpadvayaṃ tasya syāt tataśca nikaṭasthitasya pratibhāsadvayaṃ syāt na ca niyamo
T11n1242u_001:693: ucyate na hi nīlaṃ vastu spaṣṭanūpamaspaṣṭaṃ ca api tu nīlaṃ sādhyārthakriyāsamarthaṃ nīlaparamāṇunūpam |
T11n1242u_001:695: yadā dūre nīlaṃ paśyati tadālokaparamāṇūnāṃ ca rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtatvātspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati |
T11n1242u_001:696: nikaṭe tu ālokaparamāṇūnāṃ bahutvānna te rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtā iti spaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate |
T11n1242u_001:697: jñānasya spaṣṭādidvāreṇārthasya spaṣṭāspaṣṭanūpe bhavato na paramārthata iti |
T11n1242u_001:700: nanu tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇamityuktaṃ tatra yadi pratyakṣasyaiva viṣayo bhavati svalakṣaṇaṃ nānyasyeti tadānumānāderna svalakṣaṇaviṣayaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:703: tadānumānasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo na niṣiddha iti svalakṣaṇaviṣayamanumānaṃ syāditi manyamānaḥ pṛcchati |
T11n1242u_001:707: yadyapi vikalpasya viṣayo vastu na bhavati tathāpi sa eva svalakṣaṇaṃ dāhādyarthakriyānūpeṇa vyavasāyādityabhiprāyaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:710: na hāropabalādavastu vastu bhavati sarvasya śaśaviṣāṇādervastutvaprasaṅgāt |
T11n1242u_001:714: idameva paramārthasattvaṃ nāma yaduta jñāne pratibhāsanam |
T11n1242u_001:715: sāmānyamapi jñāne pratibhāsate tadapi paramārtha saditi manyamānaḥ pṛcchati |
T11n1242u_001:718: tadayamartha ityādinā samudāyasya padānāṃ tātparyaṃ darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:723: na ca jñānajanakatvenārthakriyākāritvaṃ tasya jñānasya vināpi sāmānyena vāsanābalātsāmānyaviṣayasyotpatteriti |
T11n1242u_001:725: tathāhītyādinā pratyakṣaviṣayeṇa saha vikalpaviṣayasya sāmānyasya visadṛśatvaṃ darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:726: kathaṃ punarvikalpasya viṣayo bhavati sāmānyamityāha samāropyamāṇamiti sakalavahnisādhāraṇatayā sāmānyākārasya saṃvedyatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:727: so'numānasya viṣayo grāhyanūpa iti grāhyaṃ nūpamasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ |
T11n1242u_001:728: atrāpi grāhyāpekṣayā viṣayo vyavasthāpito na prāpyāpekṣayā tatrāvipratipatteḥ |
T11n1242u_001:729: nanu tatsāmānyamiti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ prastutya sa ityanena puṃtliṅgena parāmarśaḥ kathamityāha sarvanāmnetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:730: kasmātpunaḥ pratyakṣapariccheda anumānasya viṣayavipratipattirnirākṛtā vārtikakāreṇa nānumānapariccheda ityāha sāmānyalakṣaṇamityādi |
T11n1242u_001:733: numānasya viṣayo vyavasthāpyeta tadā tatraiva granthaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt |
T11n1242u_001:734: ko'sau vānumānasya viṣayaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayādanyaḥ pratyakṣasyaiva ko'
T11n1242u_001:735: sau viṣayo yadapekṣayāyamanyaḥ punarvaktavyaṃ svalakṣaṇamityevamāvartyamāne gauravaṃ syāt |
T11n1242u_001:739: tathāhi pramāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ pramitikriyāṃ vinā na bhavati yathā chittiṃ vinā na paraśuḥ |
T11n1242u_001:742: ato mīmāṃsakenendriyaṃ pramāṇamindriyārthasannikarṣaḥ manaindriyasannikarṣaḥ ātmamanaḥ sannikarṣaśceṣṭaḥ sarve sannikarṣāśceti | taduktam |
T11n1242u_001:744: manaso vendriyairyoga ātmanā sarva eva vā ||
T11n1242u_001:746: tadā jñānaṃ phalaṃ tatra vyāpārācca pramāṇatā |
T11n1242u_001:747: vyāpāro na yadā teṣāṃ tadā notpadyate phalamiti ||
T11n1242u_001:748: tathā pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pramāṇamuttaramuttaraṃ phalamiti coktam |
T11n1242u_001:752: idaṃ tvadhikaṃ viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ viśeṣyajñānaṃ phalamiti yathoktaṃ kumārilena |
T11n1242u_001:757: kathaṃ punararthaparichittinūpaṃ pramāṇasya phalaṃ nārthapravartakādi vijñānamityāha arthasyetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:759: yena phalena niṣpannenānantareṇa pramāṇasya karaṇatvavyapadeśo bhavati tadeva phalaṃ nānyat |
T11n1242u_001:760: arthaparicchedakatvena vijñāna utpanne svaviṣayaniścayajanakatve sati samāpto jñānasya pramāṇavyāpāra iti |
T11n1242u_001:763: pramāṇādarthaparicchittinūpasya phalasya bhinnatvaṃ darśayituṃ pramāṇajñānasya svanūpaṃ prāgdarśitamapi punarapi darśayati prāpakaṃ jñānamityādinā
T11n1242u_001:765: yasmātprāpakaṃ vijñānaṃ pramāṇamiṣṭamasmābhiḥ tasmātsā ca prāpaṇaśaktirathaparicchittireva nārthādutpattyādikamiti |
T11n1242u_001:768: yato bījādeḥ sakāśādaṅkurasyārthāvabhāsitvotpattirasti na ca bījādikaṃ prāpayati khalavilāntargatasyāpi bījasyāṅkurotpādakatvādityabhiprāyaḥ
T11n1242u_001:769: tasmādityādinā jñānasyārthādutpattivyāpārādanya eva pramāṇavyāpāra iti darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:771: yadyevaṃ prāpaṇaśaktiḥ phalaṃ tarhi nārthaparicchittinūpaṃ phalam |
T11n1242u_001:773: yadeva prāpakaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva pravartakamarthapradarśakaṃ ca tadeveti purastātsaṃvarṇitaṃ pramāṇasvanūpacintāyām |
T11n1242u_001:774: tataścārthapradarśakameva prāpakaṃ tasya ca prāpaṇaśaktirarthaparicchittireva tāvatā parisamāptatvātpramāṇavyāpārasyeti sthitam |
T11n1242u_001:776: yadi jñānasya pramitinūpaṃ phalaṃ jñānāttarhi pramāṇena bhinnena bhavitavyamiti manyamānaḥ pṛcchati yadi tarhītyādinā |
T11n1242u_001:777: arthasānūpyamasya pramāṇamiti etasya vivaraṇaṃ arthena yatsānūpyamityādi |
T11n1242u_001:780: viṣayādutpadyamānaṃ viṣayasadṛśaṃ bhavatīti tadeva sānūpyaṃ sādṛśyamuktamiti darśayati iha yasmādityādinā nanu cetyādi |
T11n1242u_001:782: indriyādikaṃ pramāṇamuktamasmābhiḥ tadeva kiṃ bauddhenāpi neṣyate yenārthasānūpyaṃ pramāṇamiṣyate |
T11n1242u_001:784: ṅgīkriyamāṇe pramāṇaphalayoraikyānnaikaṃ karma karaṇaṃ bhavatīti yaccoditaṃ tattadavasthameveti |
T11n1242u_001:788: prakṛṣṭopakārakaṃ jñānasya sānūpyameva tadvaśādarthādhigatisiddheḥ nendriyādikaṃ arthasānūpyābhāve'
T11n1242u_001:792: nīlanirbhāsaṃ hītyādinā nīlākāraṃ nīlavijñānasya nīlāvagamavyavasthāyā nimittaṃ darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:793: yasmānnīlākāre vijñānasyāvagate nīlapratītiravagamyate tasmādarthākāraḥ pramāṇaṃ karaṇadharmatvādasyeti |
T11n1242u_001:797: kiṃ tu teṣāṃ sarvajñānotpattiṃ prati nimittatvānna pratiniyatārthavyavasthāpanasya nimittatvam |
T11n1242u_001:800: yattatpareṇa coditaṃ pramāṇaphalayoraikyānna caikaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ vā syāditi tatpariharati |
T11n1242u_001:802: syādayamekasya vastuno virodho yadyayaṃ janyajanakabhāvaḥ pramāṇaphalayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ kiṃ tarhi vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvaḥ |
T11n1242u_001:806: tathā hi nīlākāre vijñāna utpanne viśiṣṭajñānaṃ vyavasthāpayanti nīlajñānamanubhūtamiti na jñānamutpādayati |
T11n1242u_001:808: nanu ca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ viśiṣṭākāramutpannaṃ kathaṃ tasya samānakāla evāṃśaṃśitayā vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvo bhavatīti manyamāna pṛcchati
T11n1242u_001:812: na vijñānameva nirvikalpakamātmānaṃ vyavasthāpayati kiṃtu pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyate |
T11n1242u_001:813: tatra cārthākārasya vyavasthāpanahetutvamasānūpyavyāvṛttibhedenārthabodhatayā vyavasthāpyasyotpādena vedanasya tu vyavasthāpyatvam |
T11n1242u_001:816: nanu nīlajñānamutpannaṃ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣasiddhaṃ yadi niścayavaśātpramāṇavyavasthā labhyate tadā yujyate vaktuṃ niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyata iti yāvatā niścayapratyayaṃ vināpi pramāṇaṃ bhavatyevetyāha niścayapratyayenāvyavasthāpitamityādi darśayati |
T11n1242u_001:817: yāvatpratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye svātmani niścayaṃ notpādayati na tāvatpramāṇaṃ bhavati ātmavyāpārānirvartanāt |
T11n1242u_001:819: nanu yadi niścayaṃ vinā pramāṇameva na bhavati pratyakṣaṃ vikalpasahitaṃ tarhi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ syānna kevalaṃ tadanvayavyatirekāditi manyamānaścodayati yadyevamityādinā |
T11n1242u_001:821: uṃ niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyata iti yāvatā niścayapratyayaṃ vināpi pramāṇaṃ bhavatyevetyāha niścayapratyayenāvyavasthāpitamityādi darśayati
T11n1242u_001:822: yāvatpratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye svātmani niścayaṃ notpādayati na tāvatpramāṇaṃ bhavati ātmavyāpārānirvartanāt |
